abstract: Law enforcement officers in Hungary seized dozens of weapons, including pistols, rifles and machine guns, amid conflicting reports about whether they were to be used in the filming of "World War Z."
snippet: Law enforcement officers in Hungary seized dozens of weapons, including pistols, rifles and machine guns, amid conflicting reports about whether they were to be used in the filming of "World War Z."

headline.main: Brad Pitt, Zombies and Weapons: A Mystery in Hungary
